00066 CNFamilialEngine * CNFamilialEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00067 {
00068     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNFamilialEngine::EngineName())
00069         return (CNFamilialEngine *)engine;
00070     return NULL;
00071 }

00090 /**
00091  * @brief Initialize the data and free any memory allocated.
00092  */
00093 void CNFamilialEngine::clear()
00094 {
00095     if (m_pstdMethods != NULL) {delete m_pstdMethods; m_pstdMethods = NULL;}
00096     m_cychpIndex.clear();
00097     m_cychpMother.clear();
00098     m_cychpFather.clear();
00099     m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.deleteAll();
00100     m_vCNFamilialReporters.deleteAll();
00101 }

00110 /**
00111  * @brief Dump the standard methods to the output stream specified
00112  * @param std::ostream& - The specified output stream
00113  */
00114 void CNFamilialEngine::printStandardMethods(std::ostream &out) {
00115     if (m_pstdMethods == NULL) {return;}
00116     std::map<std::string,std::string>::iterator iter;
00117     out << std::endl << "Standard Methods:" << std::endl;
00118       unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00119       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00120         if(iter->first.size() > maxLength)
00121           maxLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00122       }
00123       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00124         unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00125         out << " '" << iter->first << "' ";
00126         currentLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00127         while(currentLength < maxLength + 1) {
00128             out.put(' ');
00129           currentLength++;
00130         }
00131         out << iter->second << std::endl;
00132       }
00133 }

00135 /**
00136  * @brief Define the options used by this engine
00137  */
00138 void CNFamilialEngine::defineOptions() {
00139 
00140   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00141   defineOption("", "index-cychp-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00142                      "Cychp file specifying the sample to process as the index.",
00143                      "");
00144   defineOption("", "mother-cychp-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00145                      "Cychp file specifying the sample to process as the mother.",
00146                      "");
00147   defineOption("", "father-cychp-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00148                      "Cychp file specifying the sample to process as the father.",
00149                      "");
00150   defineOption("", "allele-frequency-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00151                      "Text file specifying allele frequencies.",
00152                      "");
00153 
00154   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00155   defineOption("","familial-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00156                      "The file name to output the familial data (in calvin format) to.",
00157                      "");
00158   defineOption("","text-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00159                      "Output data in ASCII text format in addition to calvin format.",
00160                      "true");
00161   defineOption("","text-header", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00162                      "Include calvin header in ASCII text output.",
00163                      "false");
00164   defineOption("","relatedness-test", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00165                      "Include RelatednessTest data table in output",
00166                      "true");
00167 
00168   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00169 
00170   defOptMult("a", "analysis", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00171                    "String representing analysis pathway desired.",
00172                    "");
00173 
00174   defineOptionSection("Advanced Options"); 
00175   defineOption("", "xChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "X Chromosome.", "24");
00176   defineOption("", "yChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "Y Chromosome.", "25");
00177 
00178   defineOptionSection("Misc Options");
00179   defineOption("", "explain", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00180                     "Explain a particular operation (i.e. --explain brlmm or --explain brlmm-p).",
00181                     "");
00182 }

00189 /**
00190  * @brief Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00191  */
00192 void CNFamilialEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00193 
00194   defineStates();
00195 
00196   if(getOpt("explain") != "") { explain(); exit(0); }
00197 
00198   std::string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
00199   std::vector<std::string> analysis = getOptVector("analysis");
00200 
00201   if (!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("index-cychp-file"))) {
00202     error("Must provide a valid index-cychp-file.");
00203   }
00204 
00205   if ((!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("father-cychp-file"))) && (!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("mother-cychp-file")))) {
00206     error("Must provide a valid father-cychp-file and/or a valid mother-cychp-file.");
00207   }
00208 
00209   if (!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("allele-frequency-file"))) {
00210     error("Must provide a valid allele-frequency-file.");
00211   }
00212 
00213   if (getOpt("familial-file") == "")
00214   {
00215     error("Must provide a familial-file.");
00216   }
00217 
00218   // setup output folder
00219   Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(outDir, false);
00220 
00221   if (getOpt("familial-file") != "") {
00222     if ( !Fs::dirExists(Fs::dirname(getOpt("familial-file"))) ) {
00223       Fs::mkdirPath(Fs::dirname(getOpt("familial-file")), false);
00224     }
00225   }
00226 
00227   createAnalysis();
00228 }
00229 
00230 /**
00231  * @brief Loop over all familial analyses and store calvin group and dataset names needed to run them
00232  */
00233 void CNFamilialEngine::prepareGroupsDatasets()
00234 {
00235     using std::string;
00236     using std::set;
00237 
00238     // Loop over all analyses and store the (set-theoretic) union
00239     // of all cychp groups/datasets required by them. Only those
00240     // groups/datasets will be read in later.
00241     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.size()); iIndex++)
00242     {
00243         const groupDatasets_t groupDatasets = m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->getGroupDatasets();
00244         for (groupDatasets_t::const_iterator gIter = groupDatasets.begin(); gIter != groupDatasets.end(); ++gIter)
00245         {
00246             for (set<string>::const_iterator sIter = gIter->second.begin(); sIter != gIter->second.end(); ++sIter)
00247             {
00248                 m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial[gIter->first].insert(*sIter);
00249             }
00250         }
00251     }
00252 }
00253 
00254 /**
00255  * @brief Run the specifed analysis
00256  */
00257 void CNFamilialEngine::runImp() {
00258   // make this all one big try catch to make sure destructors are
00259   // called if exceptions thrown.
00260   try { // outer try for handling the exception.
00261     try { // inner try for memory clean up.
00262         createAnalysis();
00263         prepareGroupsDatasets();
00264         loadCychpFiles();
00265         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.size()); iIndex++)
00266         {
00267             m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->run();
00268             Verbose::out(1, "*");
00269         }
00270         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNFamilialReporters.size()); iIndex++)
00271         {
00272             m_vCNFamilialReporters[iIndex]->setup(*this, m_cychpIndex, m_cychpMother, m_cychpFather, m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods);
00273             m_vCNFamilialReporters[iIndex]->run();
00274             Verbose::out(1, "*");
00275         }
00276     } // inner try end
00277     catch (...) {
00278       // Free up any allocated memory here...
00279         clear();
00280       // re-throw the unchanged exception.
00281       throw;
00282     }
00283   } // outer try end
00284   /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
00285   catch(Except &e) {
00286     Verbose::out(0,"");
00287     error("Exception caught. "
00288                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00289   }
00290   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00291     Verbose::out(0,"");
00292     error("std::bad_alloc caught. "
00293                   "The application has run out of memory. "
00294                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00295   }
00296   catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00297     Verbose::out(0,"");
00298     error("affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException caught. "
00299                    "Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00300                   "Message is: " + affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()));
00301   }
00302   catch(BroadException &e) {
00303     Verbose::out(0,"");
00304     error("BroadException caught. "
00305                   "Message is: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00306                   ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00307   }
00308   catch(const std::exception &e) {
00309     Verbose::out(0,"");
00310     error("std::exception caught. "
00311                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00312   }
00313   catch(const BaseException &e) {
00314     Verbose::out(0,"");
00315     error("newmat BaseException caught. "
00316                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00317   }
00318   catch(...) {
00319     Verbose::out(0,"");
00320     error("Unknown exception caught. "
00321                   "No message is available.");
00322   }
00323   // free any allocated memory here...
00324   clear();
00325 }
00326 
00327 /**
00328  * @brief Create the specified analysis
00329  */
00330 void CNFamilialEngine::createAnalysis()
00331 {
00332     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialEngine::createAnalysis()");
00333     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00334     std::vector<std::string>& analysis = getOptVector("analysis");
00335     if (analysis.empty())
00336     {
00337         analysis.push_back("paternity");
00338         //analysis.push_back("segment-overlap");
00339         //analysis.push_back("genotype-concordance");
00340         //analysis.push_back("genotype-discordance");
00341         //analysis.push_back("cn-neutral-loh-concordance");
00342         //analysis.push_back("cn-loss-loh-concordance");
00343         //analysis.push_back("hetero-upd");
00344         //analysis.push_back("iso-upd");
00345         //analysis.push_back("denovo-cn");
00346         //analysis.push_back("hemizygous-parent-of-origin");
00347     }
00348     CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::getParams().clear();
00349     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
00350     m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.deleteAll();
00351     m_vCNFamilialReporters.deleteAll();
00352     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < analysis.size(); i++)
00353     {
00354         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = NULL;
00355         if (analysis[i] == "") {throw(Except("Invalid (blank) analysis specification"));}
00356         Verbose::out(1, analysis[i]);
00357         pMethod = factory.CNFamilialAnalysisMethodForString(analysis[i]);
00358         pMethod->setup(m_cychpIndex, m_cychpMother, m_cychpFather, getOpt("allele-frequency-file"));
00359         m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.push_back(pMethod);
00360     }
00361     if (getOpt("familial-file") != "")
00362     {
00363         CNFamilialReporter* pReporter = NULL;
00364         pReporter = factory.CNFamilialReporterForString("familial-output");
00365         m_vCNFamilialReporters.push_back(pReporter);
00366     }
00367 }
00368 
00369 /**
00370  * @brief Load up the data from the cychp files into memory.
00371  */
00372 void CNFamilialEngine::loadCychpFiles()
00373 {
00374     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00375     // load index
00376     AffxString strIndexCychpFileName = getOpt("index-cychp-file");
00377     if (!m_cychpIndex.readFile(strIndexCychpFileName, m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial, "index", "index-cychp-file")) {error("Cannot read cychp file: " + strIndexCychpFileName);}
00378     int iMarkerCount = m_cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount();
00379     if (iMarkerCount == 0) {error("No entries found in the index-cychp-file for the ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set.");}
00380 
00381     // load mother
00382     AffxString strMotherCychpFileName = getOpt("mother-cychp-file");
00383     if (strMotherCychpFileName != "")
00384     {
00385         if (!m_cychpMother.readFile(strMotherCychpFileName, m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial, "mother", "mother-cychp-file")) {error("Cannot read cychp file: " + strMotherCychpFileName);}
00386         if (m_cychpMother.getCychpHeader().getGender() != affx::Female) {
00387             error("The mother-cychp-file does not contain female gender data");
00388         }
00389         if (m_cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount() != iMarkerCount)
00390         {
00391             error("The number of entries in the mother-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set does not equal the number of entries in the index-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set.");
00392         }
00393     }
00394 
00395     // load father
00396     AffxString strFatherCychpFileName = getOpt("father-cychp-file");
00397     if (strFatherCychpFileName != "")
00398     {
00399         if (!m_cychpFather.readFile(strFatherCychpFileName, m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial, "father", "father-cychp-file")) {error("Cannot read cychp file: " + strFatherCychpFileName);}
00400         if (m_cychpFather.getCychpHeader().getGender() != affx::Male) {
00401             error("The father-cychp-file does not contain male gender data");
00402         }
00403         if (m_cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount() != iMarkerCount)
00404         {
00405             error("The number of entries in the father-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set does not equal the number of entries in the index-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set.");
00406         }
00407     }
00408     checkFamilialConsistency();
00409     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00410 }
00411 
00412 // Make sure the cychp trio use the same CN reference and annotation file
00413 void CNFamilialEngine::checkFamilialConsistency()
00414 {
00415     if (getOpt("mother-cychp-file") != "") {
00416         checkFamilialConsistencyPair(m_cychpIndex, m_cychpMother);
00417     }
00418     if (getOpt("father-cychp-file") != "") {
00419         checkFamilialConsistencyPair(m_cychpIndex, m_cychpFather);
00420     }
00421 }
00422 
00423 void CNFamilialEngine::checkFamilialConsistencyPair(CNCychp& cychp1, CNCychp& cychp2)
00424 {
00425     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName())
00426     {
00427         error("CN reference files mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00428               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists CN reference '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName()) + "', "
00429               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists CN reference '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName()) + "'");
00430     }
00431     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName())
00432     {
00433         error("Annotation files mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00434               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists annotation file '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName()) + "', "
00435               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists annotation file '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName()) + "'");
00436     }
00437     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getArrayType() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getArrayType())
00438     {
00439         error("Array type mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00440               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists array type '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getArrayType()) + "', "
00441               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists array type '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getArrayType()) + "'");
00442     }
00443     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate())
00444     {
00445         error("dbsnp date mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00446               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate()) + "', "
00447               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate()) + "'");
00448     }
00449     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion())
00450     {
00451         error("dbsnp version mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00452               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion()) + "', "
00453               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion()) + "'");
00454     }
00455     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate())
00456     {
00457         error("Netaffx annotation date mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00458               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate()) + "', "
00459               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate()) + "'");
00460     }
00461     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild())
00462     {
00463         error("Netaffx build number mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00464               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild()) + "', "
00465               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild()) + "'");
00466     }
00467 }

00469 
00470 void CNFamilialEngine::explain() {
00471     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
00472     std::vector<SelfDoc>docs = factory.getDocs();
00473 
00474     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < docs.size(); i++)
00475     {
00476         if(docs[i].getDocName() == getOpt("explain"))
00477         {
00478             SelfDoc::printExplanation(docs[i],cout);
00479         }
00480     }
00481     docs.clear();
00482 }
00483 
00484 void CNFamilialEngine::extraHelp() {
00485     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
00486     printStandardMethods(cout);
00487     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Data transformations:", factory.getDocs());
00488 }
